biocontainers.name: super-focus
biocontainers.summary: Super-focus: a tool for agile functional analysis of shotgun metagenomic data

biotools.summary: An agile homology-based approach using a reduced SEED database to report the subsystems present in metagenomic samples and profile their abundances.

bioschemas.name: SUPER-FOCUS
bioschemas.summary: An agile homology-based approach using a reduced SEED database to report the subsystems present in metagenomic samples and profile their abundances.
